lead_paragraph: Through the kindness of a friend, we yesterday had an opportunity of examining some fine specimens of the Sculptures lately exhumed from the ruins of Nineveh. They were forwarded to this country by Rev. DWIGHT W. MARSH, a Missionary of the American Board at Mosul, and were received at the Agency of the Board in this City, a few days since, by the arrival of the bark Cornelia, from Beirut and Smyrna.
